title: Game-Based Mathematics Learning Design and Effectiveness Analysis (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers design and evaluate game-based learning strategies, applying diverse activity types that account for gender differences.

learning_goals: Learners can develop math educational game scenarios according to game-based learning design principles
Learners can analyze gender response differences based on game activity types (collaborative/competitive/inquiry) and apply findings to lesson design
Learners can establish strategies to prevent and resolve technical issues arising in game-based learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
